snippet: The strong play of the Giants’ defensive secondary helped propel the team to three straight wins and a postseason berth in the N.F.L.
abstract: Strong play by New York Giants defensive secondary helped propel the team to three straight wins and a postseason berth in the NFL; secondary's relative resurgence might trace back to the improved pass rush of the defensive line, which has been able to get such a push toward the quarterback that the Giants have not had to rely on blitzes, allowing for more help in coverage.
lead_paragraph: The strong play of the Giants’ defensive secondary helped propel the team to three straight wins and a postseason berth in the N.F.L.

headline.seo: On Defense, the Giants Are Doing More and Winning More
headline.main: The Giants’ Secondary Is Burned No More
headline.print_headline: The Giants’ Secondary Is Burned No More
